mapper.select: select * from item where item_deleted_yn = 'N' order by item_created_at desc;
mapper.delete: update review set review_delete_yn = 'Y' where review_idx = #{reviewIdx}
update review set review_delete_yn = 'N' where review_idx = #{reviewIdx}
mapper.select: select r.mem_idx, r.item_name,o.order_num ,r.orderlist_idx, r.refund_idx, r.refund_reason, r.refund_status, r.item_price, o.item_thumb, date_format(refund_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as refund_date from refund r left join orderlist o on r.orderlist_idx = o.orderlist_idx
mapper.update: update refund set refund_status = '반품완료' where refund_idx = #{refundIdx}
update item set item_deleted_yn = 'Y' where item_num = #{itemNum}
update member set mem_name=#{memName}, mem_email=#{memEmail}, mem_phone=#{memPhone}, mem_updateDate = now() where mem_idx=#{memIdx};
